text: Egg is a municipality in the Bregenz Forest in the Austrian state of Vorarlberg. It is part of the district of Bregenz. In 1894, the Brauerei Egg was founded in Egg. By now, it is the only brewery left in the Bregenz Forest. The Egg Museum is a regional museum that was founded in 1904. == Twin towns == * Burscheid, Germany == References == == Other websites == * * Website of the Egg Museum Category:Settlements in Vorarlberg
title: Egg, Austria
